Posts.Content: I have found out today I have Stage 1 breast cancer which is grade 2/3. Am booked in for lumpectomy next Wednesday and then treatment of radiotherapy and possibility chemo too depending on what it looks like.Â

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for this, the support I have had so far has been fantastic. Not the club I've always anticipated joining!!!! X
